name: Skyland (NikoA)
description:
A game about the mystical land of the skies, which is very creativly named Skyland. 

Producer - Anna-Sofia Saarikoski

Graphics - Anna-Sofia Saarikoski & Lukas Fagerström

Sound Design - Jussi Ojala

Programming - Niko Ahonen

This game was made as part of a competence demonstration at Sataedu, a Finnish vocational college.
